name: NewYorker
text:
“I feel bad for young reporters who have to work solitary," JoAnne Wasserman said. "I learned so much from watching and listening.”
https://t.co/l7UjCBM8OQ

name: NewYorker
text:
The value of accomplishment, and the sense that art is as worthy a pursuit as work, runs as a theme through “Yves & Variation," a new 15-minute documentary about one extraordinary New Yorker. Watch here.
https://t.co/7tQCmVftkA
